summary: This document is an email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding a draft indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email congratulates the team on progress and requests a Word version of the original Epstein complaint.

events.title: Draft Maxwell Indictment Circulation
events.description: A draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell is circulated among U.S. Attorney's Office staff for review.

keyFacts: A draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was being prepared by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York as of June 11, 2020.
The email exchange indicates coordination among prosecutors in the Maxwell case.
The request for a Word version of the 'original Epstein complaint' suggests reference to earlier charging documents against Jeffrey Epstein.
